SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[CoreFormsRelations] ( [CoreFormsRelations_Ky] int IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL , [CoreForms_Ky] int NULL , [CoreGrids_Ky] int NULL , [CoreFormsRelations_Order] int NULL , [CoreFormsRelations_UserInsert] int NULL , [CoreFormsRelations_UserUpdate] int NULL , [CoreFormsRelations_UserDelete] int NULL , [CoreFormsRelations_DateInsert] datetime NULL , [CoreFormsRelations_DateUpdate] datetime NULL , [CoreFormsRelations_DateDelete] datetime NULL ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[CoreFormsRelations] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_CoreFormsRelations PRIMARY KEY ([CoreFormsRelations_Ky])
